DataElement.preferredName: Immunoglobulin Heavy Chain Variable Domain Gene Mutation Present Yes No Does Not Know Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no/does not know indicator related to the presence of a gene mutation portion of an antibody molecule that contains the three hypervariable regions in the heavy chains.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Immunoglobulin Heavy Chain Variable Domain Gene Mutation Present
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The portion of an antibody molecule that contains the three hypervariable regions in the heavy chains. It is comprised of at most a third of the heavy chains from the amino termini._The result of any gain, loss or alteration of the sequences comprising a gene, including all sequences transcribed into RNA._Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Immunoglobulin Heavy Chain Variable Domain Gene Mutation
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The portion of an antibody molecule that contains the three hypervariable regions in the heavy chains. It is comprised of at most a third of the heavy chains from the amino termini.:The result of any gain, loss or alteration of the sequences comprising a gene, including all sequences transcribed into RNA.

Concepts.definition: The portion of an antibody molecule that contains the three hypervariable regions in the heavy chains. It is comprised of at most a third of the heavy chains from the amino termini.
The result of any gain, loss or alteration of the sequences comprising a gene, including all sequences transcribed into RNA.

Property.preferredDefinition: Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Concepts.definition: Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Does Not Know Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity._The non-affirmative response to a question._The answer is not known by the person answering._An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The answer is not known by the person answering.

Concepts.definition: The answer is not known by the person answering.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
The answer is not known by the person answering.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
